shelfButtonInfos.label: Delete Keys Default
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Delete keys and set default value
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.common.tak_misc as tak_misc
import imp
imp.reload(tak_misc)
tak_misc.delKeySetDflt()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Delete Keys
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.common.tak_misc as tak_misc
import imp
imp.reload(tak_misc)
tak_misc.delKey()

shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Delete constraints on the selected object(s)

shelfButtonInfos.label: Retargeter
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takRetargeter.ui as tru
import imp
imp.reload(tru)

try:
    trUI.close()
except:
    pass

trUI = tru.takRetargeterUI.TakRetargeterUI()
trUI.show()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Link Constraint
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from takMaxAniTools import linkConstraintUI as linkCnstUI
import imp
imp.reload(linkCnstUI)

ui = linkCnstUI.LinkConstraintUI()
ui.show()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Animation Publisher

apCtrl = apctrl.AniPublisherCtrl()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Speed Calculator
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from imp import reload
from takTools.animation import speedCalculator as sc; reload(sc)

object = cmds.ls(sl=True)[0]
sc.speedHUDToggle(object)

shelfButtonInfos.label: Speed Baker
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from imp import reload
from takTools.animation import speedCalculator as sc; reload(sc)

object = cmds.ls(sl=True)[0]
sc.bakeSpeedAttribute(object)
